description: 1. You wake up in a dark room. The sound of machinery can be heard around you, but the room is empty. To the north is a door, and there is a small key on the floor.
2. You are in a room with two doors, one to the west and one to the east.
3. You are in a dark room. There is a man lying on his stomach on the floor. A gun is lying besides him. There is a door to the north
4. You are in a room that appears to be empty.
4. You are in a dim lit room. There are bunk bed by the walls. One of the bunk beds has a ball of blankets on it, and one can hear a wheezing-noice coming from it.
